review.title: “Great environment with passionate developers”
review.pros: Pros – * Develop in Python* Passionate developers who will help you learn* Fun, laid-back environment
review.cons: Cons – * There can be quite a bit of nerd ego, but it is manageable* Things change frequently - company goals aren't always clear* Little communication from lead management on why things are done the way they are* People seem to get promoted more from a$$-kissing than for the work that they do. Loyalty seems overly important.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Communicate more with your employers about your strategic direction, and your longer-term goals for each of the sites you maintain.
